name: EnergyPlus Object Resolver Agent
description: Resolves inter-object references in EnergyPlus models by following object-list and reference relationships.

skills.name: Resolve Object Reference
skills.description: Identify and return related objects based on object-list or reference fields defined in the EnergyPlus schema.
example: Find all material layers referenced in Construction 'WALL-1'

skills.name: Trace Reference Chain
skills.description: Recursively follow schema-defined references between objects (e.g., Surface → Construction → Materials) to trace relationships in the EnergyPlus model.
example: Given a surface, list all material layers used by its construction.
